commentaires.titre: Need to recheck the weight at delivery point
commentaires.message: Product quality is good. But, weight seemed less than 1kg. Since it is being sent in open package, there is a possibility of pilferage in between. FreshCart sends the veggies and fruits through sealed plastic covers and Barcode on the weight etc. .
